description:
Add the Courtesan, Shape Shifter and Genie to your Talisman: Digital Edition character roster with this pack.

The seductive Courtesan knows how to get what she wants! Using her natural charms, you can convince other characters to ‘gift’ you their prized possessions. Entrance their followers into joining your cause and captivate strangers with your skills!

The result of horrific experiments by evil wizards, the Shape Shifter sets off to claim the Crown of Command to hopefully discover their true form. Gain the abilities and appearance of other adventurers and your defeated foes!

Purchase this character pack to add these three characters to your character collection. They are then available to choose in all game modes.
name: Character Pack #3
